products.title: Twill Stripe Linen Gold Shadow Roman Blind
products.metadescription: There's a real sense of opulence about this stunning, darkly stylish blind. The deep grey, almost black, is complimented with gold for a luxurious richness.  Crisp and classy, the colour combo is effortlessly swanky, and feels glorious too thanks to its sumptuous linen-mix fabric
